address.streetAddress: 325 Bay St Trump International Hotel & Tower Toronto

description: Our unique "everything beauty under one roof" philosophy offers clients both express services and a full menu of luxurious signature treatments allowing you to customize your experience in one convenient beauty destination. We welcome you to Purebeauty Salon & Spa, where you can enjoy 'everything beauty under one roof' and look forward to having you as our special guest.

reviews.title: commented to the positive review of Purebeauty Salon & Spa!
text: Thank you for your kind words and positive review of Purebeauty Salon & Spa! We are thrilled to hear that you loved your experience with us and that Klara provided an amazing facial. We understand the importance of a clean and pleasant environment, and we appreciate you acknowledging the cleanliness of our spa.

It's wonderful to hear that Klara's professionalism and gentle hands made your facial a great experience. We are glad to learn that your dark acne scars have become less visible after just one session. Klara's expertise and ability to address your specific skincare concern is commendable.

We take great pride in our staff's qualifications and expertise. Klara has been practicing skincare for X number of years and has received certifications in various skincare techniques and treatments. We ensure that our staff undergoes continuous training to stay updated with the latest skincare advancements and trends.

At Purebeauty Salon & Spa, your safety and satisfaction are our top priorities. While our facials are generally safe, we always conduct a consultation prior to any treatment to discuss any specific concerns or potential risks. We believe in transparency and want to ensure that our customers are well-informed before proceeding with any procedure.

The cost and duration of the facial will vary depending on the specific treatment and session length. We have a range of options available to cater to different budgets and skincare needs. Our friendly staff is also available to assist you in selecting the best options for your goals.

Once again, we sincerely appreciate your recommendation of Klara and our spa. We strive to provide exceptional skincare services and are thrilled to hear about your positive experience. If you have any further questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to reach out to us. We look forward to welcoming you back to Purebeauty Salon & Spa in the future!

reviews.title: Excellent
text: I come for the spa and it is amazing. I travel quite a drive for their spa, and I'm so happy I've found it. All of the staff of the hotel are so kind, including the men in valet. Even when I am downtown for other reasons, I park in valet because they just make everything so easy and are so kind.

reviews.title: Great service and so relaxing..but..
text: The spa is very beautiful.  I see that some reviews say it is run down, but it must have been renovated because it is very very nice.  Staff gave great service (facial and massage).  Everything is comfortable and professional in terms of the spa service.  Like very comfortable.  Nice beds, cozy sheets, comfy robes.  Much better than other spas I have been to downtown.  Staff are friendly.  Overall very relaxing.

I can suggest one area for improvement- at the end of the service I was presented with a bill that included a set 18% gratuity.  To me, this is a FEE not a tip.  The amount was actually very similar to what I had intended to tip (only a few dollars different) but it is the fact that this makes things awkward when the bill is all printed off and just waiting for you to pay it.  Makes it seem very mandatory, as I said, like a fee.  When I questioned it, I was told it was optional and they can print me a new one if I like... awkward! I wanted to split the tip in a certain way between the 2 staff however I was very uncomfortable with the way my tip/fee was presented to me, I just paid it and left.  I gather that they do this to ensure workers are paid well.  I am all for worker rights, but just pay them a few more bucks and allow customers to tip as they like. This kind of soured things for me at the end of an otherwise great experience.

reviews.title: Trump hotel is great, unfortunately the spa is not
text: Trump Toronto hotel is fantastic, they take customer service and guest expectations to the next level.  So you can imagine how disappointed I was when the spa fell short.  Inexperienced people working there.  They gave no direction on where to go, had no clue what services we had booked, after our first treatment we were told to wait and in one area for our second treatment but were forgotten about.  They booked out services incorrectly.  I had to take the lead with every aspect of my time there, very unorganized.   the whole spa experience was lacking.  The treatments and the people doing them were good though. But for the price and the fact that this spa is in such a great hotel, I would expect a way better spa experience.     With all the great spas close by to this hotel, I would not return to this one.

reviews.title: Caustic environment!! Terrible atmosphere!...good massage
text: An associate and myself wanted to relax after a long day of  meetings. But dear god - who chose the management there please?! The staff were friendly and accommodating, the massage I received was decent as well, however when we were relaxing in the lounge room, all of a sudden, we heard screams coming from the lobby! At first I assumed it was a disgruntled guest, but eventually it turns out it was the manager of the spa screaming at some of the employees. After the treatment, the manager greeted us with a friendly yet phoney demeanor (as she was clearly not aware of our presence within ear-shot). I feel pity for the staff, as you can tell by the atmosphere and their faces that something is definitely wrong. The manager surely needs some oversight. I believe I will  not come back simply because of this. It's sad.

reviews.title: Blissful
text: We stayed at the Trump Hotel in celebration of our Wedding Anniversary and while there decided to take in a couples massage. The Spa was quite elegant and welcoming. The changerooms were nicely arranged and although we didn't use them, it was nice to see we could have showered right there after our massage, with all the amenities provided if we wanted to.  We had two regrets. Not booking Manny/peddies to go with our service and not having brought swimsuits to enjoy a post massage swim as recommended by our RMT's. But I guess you can't have everything and we will remember for next time!

reviews.title: Dirty, Run Down and Poorly Serviced
text: Don't waste your money at this spa.  My girlfriend and I attended this spa as a treat after the recent holiday season.  Upon arrival no one was at the front desk. We waited for 10 minutes for one of the massage therapists to usher us into the locker room where we had trouble finding two bathrobes and any slippers. Some of the lockers wouldn't even close properly.  Once in the massage room, I noticed the pillow cover was very dirty and asked for it to be changed.  The therapist told me he had forgotten to put the correct new cover on it - yuck!  The lights were not working at all in the room so I was subject to a desk lamp in the corner which was directly in my eyes the whole time. When I asked about the lights the therapist said they are having technical problems and they haven't been working for days. He then left the room to look for a towel to cover my eyes, and came back with a thin sheet. By then any relaxation I could have experienced was ruined.  The therapist felt bad and added an additional 2 minutes to my massage.  Thanks but no thanks.  Never again.

reviews.title: Worst massage, poorly run staff
text: When your paying 200$ for a massage, you have high expectations. The locker rooms were messy and I had to search for a robe. The waiting room/lounge had dirty mugs and plates everywhere laying around. The masseuses were 20 minutes late to bring us into our rooms. The massage itself was one of the worst I've experienced and I felt so bored throughout. You can hear people laughing and talking in the hallway as your trying to relax. When accepting an offer for a tea, the lady never came back with one. No organization, no relaxation, no warmth from any of the staff. The only good thing was the massage therapist taught me a stretch technique for tight traps. Save your wasted time and go to any other luxury spa in the city.

reviews.title: Worst experience. Great massage
text: Went with 4 girlfriends. Had 3 services each. Check in was poor. Waiting room (aka VIP room) lights were not working. No coffee or tea. Robes and changing area eventually offered. Lockers were 50/50 not working. Mid manicure alarms went off. Lunch came wrong and then late so some of us missed eating. Payment was an hour long as computers were slow. Some amounts were incorrect. You can't really get a receipt itemized until you give payment type. While the services were good. Massage was awesome. The experience as a whole was a mess. Manager made loads of excuses.

reviews.title: Pure beauty spa- purely disappointing
text: As with the high end hotel spas there is somewhat of an expected premium on service so the $165.00 -60 minute massage was not surprising. What was surprising was the complete lack of peripheral services you expect when paying this premium. There was a lobby - a small side room where I completed my paperwork , change room/showers and treatment rooms.  Even in the change room the paper towels were akin to something you would find in a Walmart bathroom, low end hair products and no-name brand mouthwash.  No cell service in the change room and no drinking water to be seen anywhere. The topper in this whole disappointing venture was the room was so hot I could barely stand it. And the therapist agreed whole heartedly but could not change it.  To put it in perspective I usually ask for the heated pad in areas not being worked on. I was actually sweating and it was so dry I had to ask the therapist for a drink half way through when I started coughing. The treatment was so so. Even though it was Swedish the pressure was so light it was negligible. Disappointing right to the end where I had to struggle with my bags through the door leaving the tower while the doorman looked on.
Trump indeed.

reviews.title: Relaxing experience at a fabulous spa
text: I have been to many spas around the world and pure beauty is definitely one of my favorites. From the moment you walk in the service is excellent. Friendly desk staff bring you to the changing rooms which are immaculate. You are then able to enjoy the pool area and sauna in a lovely tranquil environment.The RMT Stella who I had booked in with for a massage was excellent. She took her time to go through everything with me and made sure I was comfortable at all times. I slept pur beauty refreshed and rejuvenated. A wonderful way to unwind. I would definitely recommend as a go to spa in TO.

reviews.title: My facial with Klara was like heaven on earth!
text: It was my first trip to Trump and PureBeauty and I loved the atmosphere and the service was very professional. The best part by far was my actual facial with Klara. I've had many facials before but this was by far one of my best experiences. She was not only great, she was also very tuned in and knew when I wanted to simply relax and when I wanted to get some information about what she was doing. I did the oxygenation facial.... sublime Klara...thankyou! Will definitely book again!

reviews.title: "Fantastic experience"
text: I had such a fantastic experience at The Purebeauty Spa 2 weeks ago. My family surprised me with an afternoon at the Spa for my birthday. The afternoon started with some time in the pool, jacuzzi, and sauna, then I met with Stella for an hour massage. She was very attentive, asking if the pressure was ok, and what my areas of concern were. Once we were wrapped up, I had my own VIP room with a wonderful lunch and a buffet of sweets waiting for me. Next it was off with Klara for a 75 min body wrap. She was simply amazing! A very warm smile, very comforting, and calmly led me through the entire treatment, step by step (it was my first time). Overall, it was a very relaxing afternoon with Stella and Klara... just what I needed!

reviews.title: Princess for a day
text: I had went to Purebeauty for a girls day with some friends. I had an express mani and was blown away at how thorough it was for an express (cuticles, hand massage, soak) was like a full on manicure. On top of it all we were treated with some bubbly and treats. The place is very clean and professional and everyone was very pleasant. My nails get a beating and days later they still look great! Definitely recommend Purebeauty.

reviews.title: excellent service
text: I had an amazing time to celebrate my birthday with my wife at Purebeauty.  Very  professional staff with friendly  and warm environment. Our service providers Stella, Sumiko, Glena and  Marie gave us an  exceptional service. Our concierge  Cassandra made us feel  very  welcome and  I would highly recommend this place to everyone to try!!!!!

reviews.title: A fabulous time
text: I recently had the pleasure of having a manicure at the beautiful Purebeauty salon and spa inside of the Trump hotel in Toronto. My manicurist was fantastic, customer service was outstanding and I look forward to sharing my next experience with some girlfriends.I highly recommend the Purebeauty salon and spa to anyone in need of a fabulous escape.

reviews.title: Amazing & Beautiful Service
text: I had the pleasure of hosting a large-scale event for some influential media at Pure Beauty Salon & Spa. The team was accommodating, friendly, and nothing short of amazing. From the beginning planning stages to the execution of the event - Pure Beauty Salon & Spa made everything easy. The staff provided exceptional service to our guests and ensured everyone was comfortable and had everything they needed. All of our guests only had great things to say about their experience. 5 stars and more for an amazing team and space at Pure Beauty Salon & Spa!

reviews.title: Luxury on the fly!
text: On a recent business trip to the city, I needed to look put together quick. I didn't have a lot of time to spend, about an hour and a bit, so I opted for an express manicure, facial waxing, and mineral makeup application at Purebeauty at the Trump. I was blown away by their 5-star service from start to finish. My waxing was the best I've ever had, no bumps or redness, and my makeup looked phenomenal and was done in record time. My favourite part was getting served sparkling juice and truffles while getting a manicure. It's the attention to small details that make this place stand out. Will visit again to experience their slower services like massage.

reviews.title: What a treat!
text: I was treated to a manicure here when I was in town in July. From the moment I entered I felt like an absolute princess. I've been to a lot of spas and this one is at the very top of my list. They really make you feel like a VIP. Get there in advance of your treatment and avail of the awesome facilities they have. I can't wait to get back to Toronto to pay it a visit!

reviews.title: Spray tan
text: I had a spray tan at Pure Beauty recently and the whole experience was fantastic.
I was greeted warmly at the front desk and shown to the changing rooms to change into a robe.

Glena met me in the lounge area and took me to the tanning booth. I asked for a dark tan and I was very happy with the shade. When I returned to work that morning I received a number of compliments from people asking if I had been away and saying that i looked very relaxed and tanned. As with any spray tan, it really came up on day 2. After I showered to remove any excess the tan was absolutely perfect, a lovely colour and completely even. Five stars for Pure Beauty and Glena.
This is a great spa to go to if you want to feel pampered. The decor and atmosphere is very luxurious and it feels like an extra special treat

reviews.title: Amazing Service  - I was blown away!
text: I have to say I am blown away by the amazing service and care that everyone at the spa provided to me. From the moment I walked in I received a warm welcome from the spa concierge, who also showed me around and was really wonderful.

I actually came to the spa for a massage and my RMT Stella was amazing, like no other RMT I have ever met.  I was blown away at how wonderful she was.  She really loves her job and her clients and it shows through her kindness and work.  She welcomed me with a smile and treated me like I was a good friend that she had known for years, when it was my first time at the spa.  She ensured all my needs were met and gave me tips to help me between appointments.  She recommended that I went up to the pool to help ease my muscles and went above and beyond to order me a tea.  I was so impressed with Stella's care and treatment.  I have already told my friends and family about her and the great service I received from everyone at Purebeauty.
I will be back for sure to see Stella, she is an absolute gem.

reviews.title: Unimpressed
text: I had a couples massage here several months ago and perhaps my expectations were too high but I was totally underwhelmed.
Upon entering the spa, I was greeted by staff memberwho didn't appear to want to be there, let alone help you check in and prepare for your treatment.
The locker room was small and the slippers were too sizes too small for me.
The massage was OK but I've had better for much less.
The Trump is a five star hotel and the rest of our stay matched that rating, unfortunately our spa experience did not.

reviews.title: Good Massage Facility Run Down
text: Starting on a positive note, the massage was good. Attendant was very professional and new the job.

Facility was not up to par for a five star spa. Robes are old and small slippers were one size. Staff tries hard but it doesn't seem like management puts in a lot of money. Really lacks the ambiance of a four seasons. More of an in and out experience.

reviews.title: Bad management and very low-class for a 5 star hotel
text: For a 5-star hotel, the spa was awful. Very unprofessional management especially the spa director. She forgets to book in appointments as well as RMT receipts. She uses the excuse that the system is down. I've worked at a spa before and systems are NEVER down. Every time I come in the spa, new employees all the time. I've never seen such a huge turnover. Staff is unprofessional and very bad at multitasking. I always see them freaking out when there is a crowd of people waiting to check in or check out. It is a joke. Food is expensive as well, the lockers are always dirty, the slippers are PAPER that you use at manicure/pedicure station. I am unhappy with this place and will NOT recommend it to anybody. Save your money and go to four seasons. You will be well taken care of. You know you are in a good environment when you see smiles on the employees. All the employees at Pure Beauty look unhappy. Something is wrong there.

reviews.title: Excellent massage by Stella
text: I have to say I had a wonderful experience yet again!  Adam at the front desk was wonderful - friendly, helpful and really knowledgeable. No ask was too great and every interaction was done with a smile.   My massage with Stella was fantastic, she really cares about her clients and goes above and beyond to make sure that you are comfortable and enjoy every minute of your massage.  I feel so relaxed after her massages that I just wish they would never end.  Stella is truly a treasure!
Had a wonderful experience and Adam and Stella are truly great!

reviews.title: Poor Spa service and Expensive food
text: The Spa was awful and the Spa staff were unprofessional and the Spa management was so weak and unprofessional too. I had never seen such unprofessionalism in a hotel like that before. I felt they had robbed me. The food there was so expensive due to 18% gratuity and $5 charges that meant nothing but charging you more on things that do not cost that much

reviews.title: Amazing facial done by Klara!
text: I loved my experience at the Spa!  The place is very nice and clean but the best part was my facial. Klara is very professional and she has the most gentle hands. She really knows what she's doing. I have some dark acne scars and in just one session they are less visible. So happy with the result. I highly recommend Klara to anyone who wants to have better skin!

reviews.title: Worst experience of my life!
text: I went in for a massage, oxygen facial, and a blow dry because it's in the trump and I assumed the service would be great. The massage was great. When I went for the facial, the esthetician kept trying to sell me products and when I asked what the benefits of them were she simply replied "they're good". Her nails were long and scratching my skin, I asked her to be gentle and she said that's how it's supposed to be. She then covered my face with a scorching hot towel, which burned cause my face was already scratched, and I can hear her blowing her nose on top of me. Enough about the facial, let me tell you about the blow dry... My hair turned out great, but the man doing my hair was the biggest pervert!!!! The whole time he kept looking down my top, and i felt really uncomfortable. After my services, I asked to speak to the manager, she came out and told me she was leaving for the day and I should call her another day. What kind of management is this?!?!

reviews.title: Manicure Magic!
text: Huge props to the amazing Loren for once again making my nails so pretty!  Her attention to detail and commitment to perfection are unrivalled. To say she will go above and beyond for her clients is an understatement. She is the only professional that my partner and I will let do our nails when we are in Toronto...  Make sure you ask for Loren when booking!

reviews.title: Excellent customer service and extremely talented staff!!!
text: I wanted to book salon and spa services for my sister’s bridal shower.  After experiencing a fiasco booking appointments at another spa, I decided to try PureBeauty Spa at the Trump Towers, and boy was I glad I did!  I cannot praise their excellent customer service and talented staff enough!!!

From the beginning, the spa concierges made booking services for the bridal shower SO EASY!  Not only were they really responsive (by email and phone), they even managed to make a last minute change when one of the guests fell ill the day of the shower and couldn’t make it.
Upon arrival, we were treated like royalty!  We were given our own VIP lounge with snacks and drinks.  All of the staff members were really attentive and made sure we had everything we needed.
Fabio did the most amazing job in the salon!  My sisters and I have thick, hard to control hair and he made all of us look like we were hair models that had just stepped out of a magazine shoot!
Other guests had manicures and pedicures and were very impressed with how thorough the services were.
Overall, I would highly recommend this spa and salon and can’t wait to return!!!

reviews.title: Weekend Relaxation with a Couples Massage
text: Booked a couples massage during our stay at the Trump Hotel for our anniversary. Cassandra, the Spa Concierge was very helpful, telling me what packages to choose and providing me with details on the spa.

Checking in at the spa was quick and easy. The change rooms were nice, big and spacious. Once we got settled (completed some paper work), we went for our couples massage, it was a good massage, the RMT definitely knew what she was doing and what muscle groups to work on. IT was one of those massages where I was like 60 minutes was definitely not enough.
After the massage we were taken to a nice room, offered tea and other drinks, and there was some light snacks. It was relaxing to sit in comfy chairs and not have anything to do or anywhere to go.
The spa also has a sauna which we didnt use and a pool.
